enhanced_description: Profit.Co is an AI-powered OKR (Objectives and Key Results) software designed for precise strategy execution and comprehensive performance management. Spearheaded by founder Bastin Gerald, who brings two decades of extensive experience in Hoshin Kanri and OKRs, the platform facilitates effective goal-setting by addressing fundamental questions like "What do you want to accomplish?" and "By When?". It offers a complete solution for tracking progress through metrics and provides robust features for OKR management, customizable performance management, intuitive task management, and project portfolio management. Profit.Co aims to supercharge business growth by enabling organizations of all sizes to achieve strategic clarity, efficiently manage goals, and systematically exceed their objectives.
